titles.title: To provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of vanadium carbides and vanadium carbonitride.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/18/2002--Introduced. Requires the Customs Service to liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of vanadium carbines and vanadium carbonitride at a special rate and refund any amounts owed.
